pages.title: Gifter Statues
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Gifter Statues$() are passive, temporary, resource-generating blocks that can produce various Blocks and Items.

pages.title: Types
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Gifter Statues$() have varying types, which all generate differing amounts of resources & types of resources$(br2).

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Gifter Statues$() can be obtained through various sources, such as $(#033dfc)Boss Crates$(), $(#033dfc)Vendor Traders$() & from $(#033dfc)Vault Chests$().

pages.title: Omega Statues
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Omega Statues$() are a Statue type that is fully infinite and can be upgraded through $(#033dfc)Acceleration Chips$().$(br2)To create Omega Statues, you need to throw other Statue types into a $(#033dfc)Statue Cauldron$() which will end up producing a $(#033dfc)Omega Statue$()
